meanings.meaning: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

vlive.korean: 너도 한낱 포켓몬일 뿐이야. You're nothing but a Pokemon. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #78 (2018 뮤직뱅크 연말결산 & 가요대전 비하인드)
우리 11주년이 한낱 11주년이 될 수 있도록 - 앞으로? Let's make the times to come even more special. - In the future? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : GIRLS' GENERATION Debut 11th Anniversary Message
vlive.english: Let's make the times to come even more special. - In the future?

vlive.korean: 한낱 미천한 - 지우 양 뒤에 뭐 있나요? Merely just a humble... - Jiwoo. Is there something behind you? 듣기 View video KARD : [FULL] KARD 'You & Me' COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Merely just a humble... - Jiwoo. Is there something behind you?

examples.korean: He seemed so young, a mere boy. 발음듣기 그는 너무나 어린, 한낱 소년에 불과해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He seemed so young, a mere boy. 발음

examples.korean: It is not merely a job, but a way of life. 발음듣기 그것은 한낱 직장에 불과한 것이 아니라 생활 수단이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is not merely a job, but a way of life. 발음

examples.korean: You’ve got the job. The interview will be a mere formality. 발음듣기 당신은 그 직장에 취직이 된 거예요. 면접은 한낱 요식일 뿐이에요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ve got the job. The interview will be a mere formality. 발음

examples.korean: Inflation was so high that the notes were like Monopoly money. 발음듣기 인플레이션이 하도 심해서 지폐가 한낱 종잇조각 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Inflation was so high that the notes were like Monopoly money. 발음

examples.korean: A goal without a plan is just a wish. (Antoine de Saint-Exupery) 발음듣기 계획 없는 목표는 한낱 꿈에 불과하다. (생텍쥐페리, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: A goal without a plan is just a wish. (Antoine de Saint-Exupery) 발음
